document_data.name: true prayer of the chosen
document_data.mainbody: '''True prayer of the chosen''' was a spell that used [[truespeak]] to shield one creature with divine insight.
document_data.Effects: Those protected with the ''true prayer of the chosen'' were more difficult to strike or to affect due to a golden coruscation around them, through which a deity gave them divine insight into the dangers they faced.
document_data.Components: Besides a [[holy symbol]] and a [[verbal component]], the caster needed to speak their own personal [[true name]], a task involving great [[truespeak]] skill.
document_data.History: This spell was known to all [[brimstone speaker]]s.{{cite book/Tome of Magic 3.5|212}}
